articles.content: In the round-up: Dutch Grand Prix promoter Jan Lammers fears a F1 race at Zandvoort will not take place this year after the government extended its ban on public events until the beginning of September.

articles.title: Key Bill Beaumont supporter forced to quit World Rugby council - The Guardian
articles.description: Francis Kean, a key supporter of Bill Beaumont’s bid for re-election as World Rugby’s chairman, has resigned after World Rugby and Beaumont put considerable pressure on the Fiji Rugby Union to act over mounting allegations
articles.content:

articles.description: The out-of-favour winger had been set to end his time at the Santiago Bernabeu this summer - but the former Tottenham Hotspur star will now stay with the Spanish giants
articles.content:
